short_text: The Surah has been so named after the word al-Qiyamah in the first verse. This is not only the name but also the title of this Surah, for it is devoted to Resurrection itself.
text:
The Surah has been so named after the word al-Qiyamah in the first verse. This is not only the name but also the title of this Surah, for it is devoted to Resurrection itself.

Period of Revelation

Although there is no tradition to indicate its period of revelation, yet there is in the subject matter of this Surah an internal evidence, which shows that it is one of the earliest Surahs to be sent down at Makkah. After verse 15 the discourse is suddenly interrupted and the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) told: "Do not move your tongue to remember this Revelation hastily. It is Our responsibility to have it remembered and read. Therefore, when We are reciting it, listen to its recital carefully. Again, it is Our responsibility to explain its meaning." Then, from verse 20 onward the same theme which was interrupted at verse 15, is resumed. This parenthetical passage, according to both the context and the traditions, has been interposed here for the reason that when the Angel Gabriel was reciting this Surah to the Holy Prophet, the Holy Prophet, lest he should forget its words later, was repeating them at the same moment. This in fact happened at the time when the coming down
and receipt of Revelation was yet a new experience for him and he was not yet fully used to receiving it calmly. There are two other instances also of this in the Qur'an. First, in Surah Ta Ha the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) has been told: "And see that you do not hasten to recite the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you." (v. 114). Then, in Surah Al-A'la, it has been said: "We shall enable you to recite:, then you shall never forget. (v. 6). Later, when the Holy Prophet became fully used to receiving the Revelation well, there remained no need to give him any such instruction. That is why except for these, three, there is no other instance of this in the Qur'an.

Theme and Subject Matter

Most of the Surahs, from here till the end of the Qur'an, in view of their content and style, seem to have been sent down in the period when after the first seven verses of Surah Al-Muddaththir, revelation of the Qur'an began like a shower of rain:Thus, in the successively revealed Surahs Islam and its fundamental concepts and moral teachings were presented so forcefully and effectively in pithy, brief sentences and the people of Makkah warned so vehemently on their errors and deviations that the Quraish chiefs were utterly confounded. Therefore, before the next Hajj season came they held the conference for devising schemes to defeat the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) as has been mentioned in the Introduction to the Surah Al-Muddaththir above.

In this Surah, addressing thee deniers of the Hereafter, replies have been given to each of their doubts and objections, strong arguments have been given to prove the possibility, occurrence and necessity of the Resurrection and Hereafter, and also it has been pointed out clearly that the actual reason of the people's denying the Hereafter is not that they regard it as impossible rationally but because their selfish motives do not allow them to affirm it. At the same time, the people have been warned, as if to say: "The event, the occurrence of which you deny, will inevitably come: all your deeds will be brought and placed before you. As a matter of fact, even before any of you sees his record, he will be knowing fully well what he has done in the world, for no man is unaware of himself, no matter what excuses and pretenses he may offer to deceive the world and deceive himself in respect of his misdeeds."
description: The surah that opens with the emphatic oath of the Divine One swearing by the looming day of Resurrection. It takes its name from verse 1, which mentions the Day of Resurrection. The surah dealing with the Day of Resurrection and man’s denial of that Day. God’s power is convincingly described in several vignettes (verse 3 ., verse 26 . and verse 34 .). The third paragraph instructs the Prophet on appropriate reception of the revelation (verse 16 .), and thereby serves to emphasize that the Quran is indeed God’s word.The surah is also known as: Day of Resurrection, The Rising.

Efendi Nahi.verse 75:2: dhe betohem në shpirtin e atij që e qorton vetveten.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:3: A mendon njeriu që nuk do të mund t’ia mbledhim eshtrat e tij?
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:4: Po si jo, Ne mundemi me ia bë majet e gishtave ashtu si i ka pasur.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:5: Por, njeriu dëshiron të gabojë përderisa të jetë gjallë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:6: e pyet: “Kur do të jetë Dita e Kijametit?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:7: Kur syri (shikimi) të shqetësohet nga frika
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:9: dhe Dielli e Hëna të bashkohen,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:10: atë ditë njeriu, thërret: “Ku të ikim?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:12: Atë ditë, strehimi është te Zoti yt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:13: atë ditë, njeriu informohet për veprat që i ka punuar, si dhe për ato që i ka lëshuar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:14: njeriu vetë do të dëshmojë kundër vetvetes,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:15: madje – edhe në qoftë se i paraqet arsyetimet e veta, (ato nuk pranohen).
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:16: Mos nxito në të lexuarit e Kur’anit me gjunë tënde,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:17: Ne, do t’i tubojmë pjesët e tij (Kur’ani), për ta lexuar atë (si është).
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:18: E, kur ta lexojë Xhebraili atë (Kur’anin), përcille ti leximin e tij,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:19: e pastaj, Ne do ta shpjegojmë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:20: Po, me të vërtetë! Ju e doni këtë jetë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:21: kurse, për jetën tjetër nuk keni kujdes.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:22: Atë ditë – disa fytyra do të shkëlqejnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:23: në Zotin e tyre do të shikojnë;
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:24: atë ditë – disa fytyra janë të mrrolura,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:25: e dinë që do t’i gjejë fatkeqësi e madhe.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:26: E, shiko! Kur të vijë shpirti në fyt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:28: dhe ai do të bindet se ai është çasti i ndarjes
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:30: atë ditë do të sillet të Zoti yt:
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:31: “Ai nuk ka besuar dhe nuk është lutur (falë namaz),
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:32: por ka mohuar dhe është shmangë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:33: e pastaj ka shkuar te të afërmit (familja) e tij, duke u krenuar”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:34: Mjer për ty! Mjer për ty!
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:35: E, përsëri: Mjer për ty! Mjer për ty!
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:36: Vallë, a mendon njeriu se do të mbetet pa obligime (pa përgjegjësi)?
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:37: A s’ka qenë njeriu së pari pikë fare (sperme) që hudhet lehtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:38: pastaj u bë gjak i doçkuar, nga i cili, Ai (Perëndia), e ka krijuar dhe e ka formur të plotë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:39: Dhe, prej tij i bëri çiftet: mashkullin e femrën,
Efendi Nahi.verse 75:40: e, vallë, Ai krijuesi, a nuk ka fuqi edhe t’i ngjallë të vdekurit?”

null.verse 75:2: And içirəm (günah etdiyi üçün, yaxud yaxşı əməli azdır deyə) özünü qınayan nəfsə! (Siz öləndən sonra mütləq diriləcəksiniz!)
null.verse 75:3: Məgər insan elə güman edir ki, (qiyamət günü) onun sümüklərini bir yerə yığa bilməyəcəyik?!
null.verse 75:4: Bəli, Biz onun barmaqlarını da (barmaq sümüklərini də, barmaqlarının uclarını da) düzəltməyə qadirik!
null.verse 75:5: Lakin insan (bundan sonra da) önündəkini (qiyaməti) danmaq (pis işlər görmək) istəyər.
null.verse 75:6: Və (istehza ilə): "Qiyamət günü nə vaxt olacaqdır?" - deyə soruşar.
null.verse 75:9: Günəşlə ay birləşəcəyi (hər ikisinin qərbdən çıxacağı, nurunun gedəcəyi) zaman -
null.verse 75:10: Məhz o gün insan: "Qaçıb can qurtarmağa yer haradadır?" - deyəcəkdir.
null.verse 75:11: Xeyr, (o gün) heç bir sığınacaq olmayacaqdır!
null.verse 75:12: O gün (ey insan!) duracaq (pənah aparılacaq) yer ancaq Rəbbinin hüzurudur!
null.verse 75:13: O gün insana öncə etdiyi və sonraya qoyduğu nə varsa (sağlığında dünyada gördüyü işlər və öləndən sonra qoyub getdiyi yaxşı, pis nə varsa, hamısı) xəbər veriləcəkdir!
null.verse 75:14: Doğrusu, insan özü-özünə şahiddir!
null.verse 75:15: O, hər cür üzrxahlıq etsə də, (qəbul olunmaz)!
null.verse 75:16: (Ya Peyğəmbər! Cəbrail sənə Qur'an oxuduğu zaman) onu tələm-tələsik əzbərləmək üçün dilini tərpətmə! (Sən də onunla birlikdə Qur'anı təkrar etmə, yalnız dinlə!)
null.verse 75:17: Cünki onu (sənin qəlbində) cəm etmək, (dilində) oxutmaq Bizə aiddir.
null.verse 75:18: Biz onu (Cəbrailin dili ilə) oxutduğumuz zaman oxunmasını diqqətlə dinlə.
null.verse 75:19: Sonra onu (sənə) bəyan etmək də Bizə aiddir!
null.verse 75:20: Xeyr, xeyr! Siz tez keçib gedəni (fani dünyanı) sevirsiniz.
null.verse 75:22: O gün neçə-neçə üzlər sevinib güləcək,
null.verse 75:24: O gün neçə-neçə üzlər tutulub qaralacaq,
null.verse 75:25: (Sahiblərinin) bel sümüklərinin (dəhşətli bir əzabla) qırılacağını anlayacaqdır!
null.verse 75:26: Xeyr, (can) boğaza (körpücük sümüklərinə) gəlib yetişəcəyi,
null.verse 75:27: "(Onu bu bəladan) kim xilas edə bilər?" - deyiləcəyi,
null.verse 75:28: (Can üstə olan kimsə) ayrılıq dəminin gəlib çatdığını anlayacağı,
null.verse 75:29: Və (ölüm qorxusundan) qıçı-qıçına dolaşacağı zaman,
null.verse 75:30: Aparılacağı yer Rəbbinin hüzuru olacaqdır (ey insan)!
null.verse 75:31: Beləliklə, o (kafir Əbu Cəhl) nə (Qur'anı) təsdiq etdi, nə də namaz qıldı.
null.verse 75:32: Amma (Allah kəlamını) yalan saydı, (ondan) üz döndərdi.
null.verse 75:33: Sonra da özünü darta-darta ailəsinin yanına getdi.
null.verse 75:35: Yenə də vay sənin halına, vay!
null.verse 75:36: Məgər insan elə güman edir ki, o, başlı-başına (cəzasız) buraxılacaq?!
null.verse 75:37: Məgər o tökülən bir qətrə nütfə deyildimi?!
null.verse 75:38: Sonra laxtalanmış qan oldu və (Allah) onu yaradıb surət verdi (insan şəklinə saldı).
null.verse 75:39: Sonra da ondan biri kişi, biri qadın olmaqla iki cift (həmtay) yaratdı.
null.verse 75:40: Elə isə O Allah ölüləri diriltməyə qadir deyildirmi?!

null.verse 75:1: Kunem se Danom kada Smak svijeta nastupi
null.verse 75:2: i kunem se dušom koja sebe kori.
null.verse 75:3: Zar čovjek misli da kosti njegove nećemo sakupiti?
null.verse 75:4: Hoćemo, Mi možemo stvoriti jagodice prsta njegovih ponovo.
null.verse 75:5: Ali, čovjek hoće dok je živ da griješi,
null.verse 75:6: pa pita: "Kada će Smak svijeta biti?"
null.verse 75:7: Kad se pogled od straha ukoči
null.verse 75:9: i Sunce i Mjesec spoje -
null.verse 75:10: tog dana čovjek će povikati: "Kuda da se bježi?"
null.verse 75:12: Toga dana biće Gospodaru tvome prepušten,
null.verse 75:13: toga dana čovjek će o onome što je pripremio, a što propustio obaviješten biti,
null.verse 75:14: sam čovjek će protiv sebe svjedočiti,
null.verse 75:15: uzalud će mu biti što će opravdanja svoja iznositi.
null.verse 75:16: Ne izgovaraj Kur’an
null.verse 75:17: Mi smo dužni da ga saberemo da bi ga ti čitao.
null.verse 75:18: A kada ga čitamo, ti prati čitanje njegovo,
null.verse 75:19: a poslije, Mi smo dužni da ga objasnimo.
null.verse 75:20: Uistinu, vi ovaj prolazni svijet volite,
null.verse 75:21: a o onom drugom brigu ne vodite.
null.verse 75:22: Toga dana će neka lica blistava biti,
null.verse 75:24: toga dana će neka lica smrknuta biti,
null.verse 75:25: tešku nevolju će očekivati.
null.verse 75:26: Pazi! Kada duša dopre do ključnih kosti,
null.verse 75:27: i vikne se: "Ima li vidara?",
null.verse 75:28: i on se uvjeri da je to čas rastanka
null.verse 75:29: i noga se uz nogu savije,
null.verse 75:30: toga dana će Gospodaru tvome priveden biti:
null.verse 75:31: Nije vjerovao, nije molitvu obavljao,
null.verse 75:32: nego je poricao i leđa okretao,
null.verse 75:33: a onda svojima bahato odlazio."
null.verse 75:35: I još jednom: Teško tebi! Teško tebi!
null.verse 75:36: Zar čovjek misli da će sam sebi prepušten biti, da neće odgovarati?
null.verse 75:37: Zar nije bio kap sjemena koja se ubaci,
null.verse 75:38: zatim ugrušak kome On onda razmjer odredi i skladnim mu lik učini,
null.verse 75:39: i od njega onda dvije vrste, muškarca i ženu, stvori,
null.verse 75:40: i zar Taj nije kadar mrtve oživiti?

null.verse 75:2: আরও শপথ করি সেই মনের, যে নিজেকে ধিক্কার দেয়-
null.verse 75:3: মানুষ কি মনে করে যে আমি তার অস্থিসমূহ একত্রিত করব না?
null.verse 75:4: পরন্ত আমি তার অংগুলিগুলো পর্যন্ত সঠিকভাবে সন্নিবেশিত করতে সক্ষম।
null.verse 75:5: বরং মানুষ তার ভবিষ্যত জীবনেও ধৃষ্টতা করতে চায়
null.verse 75:6: সে প্রশ্ন করে-কেয়ামত দিবস কবে?
null.verse 75:9: এবং সূর্য ও চন্দ্রকে একত্রিত করা হবে-
null.verse 75:10: সে দিন মানুষ বলবেঃ পলায়নের জায়গা কোথায় ?
null.verse 75:12: আপনার পালনকর্তার কাছেই সেদিন ঠাঁই হবে।
null.verse 75:13: সেদিন মানুষকে অবহিত করা হবে সে যা সামনে প্রেরণ করেছে ও পশ্চাতে ছেড়ে দিয়েছে।
null.verse 75:14: বরং মানুষ নিজেই তার নিজের সম্পর্কে চক্ষুমান।
null.verse 75:15: যদিও সে তার অজুহাত পেশ করতে চাইবে।
null.verse 75:16: তাড়াতাড়ি শিখে নেয়ার জন্যে আপনি দ্রুত ওহী আবৃত্তি করবেন না।
null.verse 75:17: এর সংরক্ষণ ও পাঠ আমারই দায়িত্ব।
null.verse 75:18: অতঃপর আমি যখন তা পাঠ করি, তখন আপনি সেই পাঠের অনুসরণ করুন।
null.verse 75:19: এরপর বিশদ বর্ণনা আমারই দায়িত্ব।
null.verse 75:20: কখনও না, বরং তোমরা পার্থিব জীবনকে ভালবাস
null.verse 75:22: সেদিন অনেক মুখমন্ডল উজ্জ্বল হবে।
null.verse 75:23: তারা তার পালনকর্তার দিকে তাকিয়ে থাকবে।
null.verse 75:24: আর অনেক মুখমন্ডল সেদিন উদাস হয়ে পড়বে।
null.verse 75:25: তারা ধারণা করবে যে, তাদের সাথে কোমর-ভাঙ্গা আচরণ করা হবে।
null.verse 75:26: কখনও না, যখন প্রাণ কন্ঠাগত হবে।
null.verse 75:27: এবং বলা হবে, কে ঝাড়বে
null.verse 75:28: এবং সে মনে করবে যে, বিদায়ের ক্ষণ এসে গেছে।
null.verse 75:29: এবং গোছা গোছার সাথে জড়িত হয়ে যাবে।
null.verse 75:30: সেদিন, আপনার পালনকর্তার নিকট সবকিছু নীত হবে।
null.verse 75:31: সে বিশ্বাস করেনি এবং নামায পড়েনি;
null.verse 75:32: পরন্ত মিথ্যারোপ করেছে ও পৃষ্ঠ প্রদর্শন করেছে।
null.verse 75:33: অতঃপর সে দম্ভভরে পরিবার-পরিজনের নিকট ফিরে গিয়েছে।
null.verse 75:35: অতঃপর, তোমার দুর্ভোগের উপর দূর্ভোগ।
null.verse 75:36: মানুষ কি মনে করে যে, তাকে এমনি ছেড়ে দেয়া হবে?
null.verse 75:37: সে কি স্খলিত বীর্য ছিল না?
null.verse 75:38: অতঃপর সে ছিল রক্তপিন্ড, অতঃপর আল্লাহ তাকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন এবং সুবিন্যস্ত করেছেন।
null.verse 75:39: অতঃপর তা থেকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন যুগল নর ও নারী।
null.verse 75:40: তবুও কি সেই আল্লাহ মৃতদেরকে জীবিত করতে সক্ষম নন?

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:1: Кълна се в Деня на възкресението.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:2: И кълна се в многоукоряващата [се] душа.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:3: Нима човек смята, че Ние не ще съберем костите му?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:4: Наистина Ние можем да възстановим и върховете на пръстите му.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:5: Ала човек упорства в греха си
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:6: и пита: Кога е Денят на възкресението?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:9: и слънцето, и луната се слеят,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:10: човекът ще каже в този Ден: Накъде да се бяга?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:12: При твоя Господ в този Ден е местопребиванието.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:13: Човекът в този Ден ще бъде известен за ранните си дела и за късните.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:14: Да, човекът сам за себе си ще е свидетел,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:16: Не си движи езика с това Слово [о, Мухаммад], за да избързаш [да го запомниш]!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:17: Да бъде събрано [в твоите гърди] и четено [от теб] е Наша грижа.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:18: И когато го четем, следвай неговото четене!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:19: После неговото разясняване е Наша грижа.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:20: Ала не! Вие обичате преходността [на земния живот]
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:22: Едни лица в този Ден ще възсияят,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:24: а други в този Ден ще бъдат мрачни,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:25: ще се убедят, че ги е сполетяла беда, пречупваща гръбнака.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:27: и се рече: Кой ще те избави?,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:28: и той се убеди, че [това] е раздялата,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:29: и се преплете крак с крак -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:30: тогава към твоя Господ ще е отправянето.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:31: тогава към твоя Господ ще е отправянето.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:32: Той нито вярваше, нито отслужваше молитвата,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:34: После отиваше при своите хора с горделива походка.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:37: Нима човек смята, че ще бъде оставен без надзор?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:38: После бе съсирек, а Той го сътвори и осъразмери.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:39: И създаде от нея двата пола - мъжа и жената.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 75:40: Нима Той не е способен да съживи мъртвите?

null.verse 75:2: 我以自責的靈魂盟誓，
null.verse 75:3: 難道人猜想我絕不能集合他的骸骨嗎？
null.verse 75:4: 不然，（我將集合他的骸骨），而且能使他的每個手指復原。
null.verse 75:5: 不然，人欲長此放蕩下去。
null.verse 75:6: 他問復活日在甚麼時候。
null.verse 75:9: 日月相合的時候，
null.verse 75:10: 在那日，人將說：「逃到哪裡去呢？」
null.verse 75:11: 絕不然，絕無任何避難所。
null.verse 75:12: 在那日，唯你的主那裡，有安定之所。
null.verse 75:13: 在那日，各人將被告知自己前前後後做過的事情。
null.verse 75:14: 不然，各人對自己就是明証，
null.verse 75:15: 即使他多方托辭。
null.verse 75:16: 你不要搖動你的舌頭，以便你倉卒地誦讀它。
null.verse 75:17: 集合它和誦讀它，確是我的責任。
null.verse 75:18: 當我誦讀它的時候，你當靜聽我的誦讀。
null.verse 75:19: 然後解釋它，也是我的責任。
null.verse 75:20: 真的，你們喜愛現世的生活，
null.verse 75:22: 而不顧後世的生活。
null.verse 75:24: 在那日，許多面目是愁苦的，
null.verse 75:25: 他們確信自己必遭大難。
null.verse 75:26: 真的，靈魂達到鎖骨，
null.verse 75:27: 有人說：「誰是祝由的？」
null.verse 75:28: 他確信那是離別。
null.verse 75:29: （死時）脛與脛相纏結。
null.verse 75:30: 在那日，他只被驅趕到你的主那裡。
null.verse 75:31: 他沒有信道，也沒有禮拜。
null.verse 75:32: 他否認真理，背棄正道，
null.verse 75:33: 然後傲慢地走回家去。
null.verse 75:35: 毀滅已逐漸地臨近你。」
null.verse 75:36: 難道人猜想自己是被放任的嗎？
null.verse 75:37: 難道他不曾是被射出精液嗎？
null.verse 75:38: 然後，他變成血塊，而真主加以創造他，使之成為肢體完全的人嗎？
null.verse 75:39: 他用精液造化兩性，男的和女的。
null.verse 75:40: 難道那樣的造化者不能使死人復活嗎？

null.verse 75:2: a při duši, jež stálé výčitky si činí!
null.verse 75:3: Myslí si člověk snad, že neshromáždíme jeho kosti?
null.verse 75:4: Však ano, a dokonce schopni jsme sestavit jeho prsty!
null.verse 75:5: A naopak, člověk si spíše přeje jednat i dál hříšně
null.verse 75:6: a ptá se: "Kdy vůbec ten den zmrtvýchvstání nastane?"
null.verse 75:9: až slunce s měsícem se spojí,
null.verse 75:10: tehdy člověk vykřikne: "Kam prchnout mám?"
null.verse 75:11: Však pozor! Nebude žádný úkryt znám,
null.verse 75:12: u Pána tvého v ten den bude shromaždiště jen!
null.verse 75:13: V ten den bude člověku sděleno, co zavčas učinil a co zameškal.
null.verse 75:14: Ba co víc, člověk sám sebe bude jasně zřít,
null.verse 75:15: a kdyby své omluvy mohl předložit...
null.verse 75:16: Nehýbej příliš jazykem svým, když je přednášíš, ve snaze je uspíšit,
null.verse 75:17: vždyť Nám přísluší je shromáždit i číst.
null.verse 75:18: A když ti je předčítáme, sleduj jeho přednášení,
null.verse 75:19: a potom na Nás je podat jeho objasnění.
null.verse 75:20: Však pozor! Vy naopak milujete rychle plynoucí
null.verse 75:22: V ten den budou jedny tváře zářící
null.verse 75:24: a jiné tváře v ten den budou sinalé, tušící,
null.verse 75:25: že dovrší se na nich trest páteř lámající.
null.verse 75:26: Však pozor! Až duše vystoupí ke klíční kosti
null.verse 75:27: a bude řečeno: "Kdo je zaklínatel?"
null.verse 75:28: a ona si pomyslí, že toto je se světem rozluka,
null.verse 75:29: a proplete se s nohou noha,
null.verse 75:30: v ten den k tvému Pánu všichni hnáni budou.
null.verse 75:31: On almužnu nedával ani modlitbu nekonal,
null.verse 75:32: však odvracel se a za lež prohlašoval,
null.verse 75:33: a pak ke své rodině pyšně kráčeje se odebral!"
null.verse 75:35: A znovu běda ti, běda!
null.verse 75:36: Myslí si člověk snad, že sám sobě bude zůstaven?
null.verse 75:37: Což nebyl kapkou semene vystříknutého jen?
null.verse 75:38: Potom se kapkou přilnavou stal a Bůh jej stvořil a vyrovnal
null.verse 75:39: a dvě pohlaví, mužské a ženské, z něho udělal.
null.verse 75:40: Což není v moci jeho, aby mrtvým opět život dal?

null.verse 75:1: Neen! Ik roep de Dag der Opstanding tot getuige.
null.verse 75:2: Neen! Ik roep de zichzelf beschuldigende ziel tot getuige.
null.verse 75:3: Denkt de mens dat Wij zijn beenderen niet kunnen verzamelen?
null.verse 75:4: Zeker; Wij hebben de macht hem te herstellen tot in zijn vingertoppen.
null.verse 75:5: Maar de mens wenst in ’t vervolg slecht te handelen.
null.verse 75:6: Hij vraagt: "Wanneer is de Dag der Opstanding?"
null.verse 75:7: Maar als het oog verblind wordt,
null.verse 75:8: En de maan verduisterd zal zijn,
null.verse 75:9: En de zon en de maan zullen samen gebracht worden,
null.verse 75:10: Op die Dag zal de mens zeggen: "Waarheen te vluchten?"
null.verse 75:12: Slechts bij uw Heer zal dan uw toevlucht zijn.
null.verse 75:13: De mens zal op die Dag worden onderricht over hetgeen hij vooruitzond of achterliet.
null.verse 75:14: Neen, de mens is een bewijs tegen zichzelf.
null.verse 75:15: Zelfs al biedt hij (zijn) verontschuldigingen aan.
null.verse 75:16: Beweeg uw tong er niet mede om deze (woorden) haastig (opte nemen!)
null.verse 75:17: Het verzamelen en het verkondigen er van rust op Ons.
null.verse 75:18: Wanneer Wij dus (de Openbaring) verkondigd hebben volg dan de verkondiging.
null.verse 75:19: Daarna rust de verklaring er van op Ons.
null.verse 75:20: Neen, maar gij (mensen) hebt dit leven lief.
null.verse 75:21: En gij geeft het Hiernamaals prijs.
null.verse 75:22: Op die Dag zullen sommige gezichten verlicht zijn,
null.verse 75:24: En andere gezichten zullen op die Dag somber zijn.
null.verse 75:25: Wetende dat een vreselijke ramp hen spoedig zal overkomen.
null.verse 75:26: Ja! Als de ziel van de stervende tot de keel zal opstijgen,
null.verse 75:27: En er zal worden gezegd: "Wie is de geneesheer?"
null.verse 75:28: Dan weet hij dat hij scheiden moet.
null.verse 75:29: En wrijft (in doodsangst) het ene been tegen het andere.
null.verse 75:30: Dan wordt (hij) tot uw Heer gedreven,
null.verse 75:31: Want hij (mens) nam de Waarheid niet aan, noch bad hij.
null.verse 75:32: Doch hij verloochende (de profeet) en wendde zich af.
null.verse 75:33: Dan ging hij trots naar zijn familie terug.
null.verse 75:35: "Wee u nogmaals en nog eens wee!"
null.verse 75:36: Denkt de mens dat hij zonder doel zal worden gelaten?
null.verse 75:37: Was hij niet een kleine levenskiem die werd uitgestort?
null.verse 75:38: Dan werd hij een klonter bloed daarna schiep en vervolmaakte Hij hem.
null.verse 75:39: Daarvan (de kiem) maakt Hij een paar, man en vrouw.
null.verse 75:40: Is Hij dan niet bij machte de doden te doen herleven?

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:1: Nay, I swear by the Day of Resurrection;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:2: Nay, I swear by the accusing soul (that this Scripture is true).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:3: Thinketh man that We shall not assemble his bones ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:4: Yea, verily. We are Able to restore his very fingers!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:5: But man would fain deny what is before him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:6: He asketh: When will be this Day of Resurrection ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:9: And sun and moon are united,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:10: On that day man will cry: Whither to flee!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:12: Unto thy Lord is the recourse that day.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:13: On that day man is told the tale of that which he hath sent before and left behind.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:14: Oh, but man is a telling witness against himself,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:16: Stir not thy tongue herewith to hasten it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:17: Lo! upon Us (resteth) the putting together thereof and the reading thereof.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:18: And when We read it, follow thou the reading;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:19: Then lo! upon Us (resteth) the explanation thereof.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:20: Nay, but ye do love the fleeting Now
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:22: That day will faces be resplendent,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:24: And that day will other faces be despondent,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:25: Thou wilt know that some great disaster is about to fall on them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:26: Nay, but when the life cometh up to the throat
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:27: And men say: Where is the wizard (who can save him now) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:28: And he knoweth that it is the parting;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:29: And agony is heaped on agony;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:30: Unto thy Lord that day will be the driving.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:31: For he neither trusted, nor prayed.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:33: Then went he to his folk with glee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:35: Again nearer unto thee and nearer (is the doom).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:36: Thinketh man that he is to be left aimless ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:37: Was he not a drop of fluid which gushed forth ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:38: Then he became a clot; then (Allah) shaped and fashioned
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:39: And made of him a pair, the male and female.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 75:40: Is not He (Who doeth so) Able to bring the dead to life ?

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:1: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:2: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:3: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:4: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:5: But man wishes to do wrong (even) in the time in front of him.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:6: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:7: At length, when the sight is dazed,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:8: And the moon is buried in darkness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:9: And the sun and moon are joined together,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:10: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:11: By no means! No place of safety!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:12: Before thy Lord (alone), that Day will be the place of rest.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:13: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward, and all that he put back.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:14: Nay, man will be evidence against himself,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:15: Even though he were to put up his excuses.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:16: Move not thy tongue concerning the (Qur’an) to make haste therewith.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:17: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:18: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:19: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:20: Nay, (ye men!) but ye love the fleeting life,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:22: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:24: And some faces, that Day, will be sad and dismal,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:25: In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:26: Yea, when (the soul) reaches to the collar-bone (in its exit),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:27: And there will be a cry, "Who is a magician (to restore him)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:28: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:29: And one leg will be joined with another:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:30: That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:31: So he gave nothing in charity, nor did he pray!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:32: But on the contrary, he rejected Truth and turned away!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:33: Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:34: Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:35: Again, Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:36: Does man think that he will be left uncontrolled, (without purpose)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:37: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:38: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (God) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:39: And of him He made two sexes, male and female.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 75:40: Has not He, (the same), the power to give life to the dead?

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:1: No! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:2: No! I swear by the reproachful soul.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:3: What, does man reckon We shall not gather his bones?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:4: Yes indeed; We are able to shape again his fingers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:5: Nay, but man desires to continue on as a libertine,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:6: asking, ’When shall be the Day of Resurrection?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:7: But when the sight is dazed
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:9: and the sun and moon are brought together,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:10: upon that day man shall say, ’Whither to flee?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:12: Upon that day the recourse shall be to thy Lord.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:13: Upon that day man shall be told his former deeds and his latter;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:14: nay, man shall be a clear proof against himself,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:15: even though he offer his excuses.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:16: Move not thy tongue with it to hasten it;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:17: Ours it is to gather it, and to recite it.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:18: So, when We recite it, follow thou its recitation.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:19: Then Ours it is to explain it.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:20: No indeed; but you love the hasty world,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:22: Upon that day faces shall be radiant,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:24: and upon that day faces shall be scowling,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:25: thou mightest think the Calamity has been wreaked on them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:26: No indeed; when it reaches the clavicles
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:27: and it is said, ’Who is an enchanter?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:28: and he thinks that it is the parting
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:29: and leg is intertwined with leg,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:30: upon that day unto thy Lord shall be the driving.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:31: For he confirmed it not, and did not pray,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:32: but he cried it lies, and he turned away,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:33: then he went to his household arrogantly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:35: then nearer to thee and nearer!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:36: What, does man reckon he shall be left to roam at will?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:37: Was he not a sperm-drop spilled?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:38: Then he was a blood-clot, and He created and formed,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:39: and He made of him two kinds, male and female.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 75:40: What, is He not able to quicken the dead?

Muhammad Asad.verse 75:1: NAY! I call to witness the Day of Resurrection!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:2: But nay! I call to witness the accusing voice of man’s own conscience!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:3: Does man think that We cannot [resurrect him and] bring his bones together again?
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:4: Yea indeed, We are able to make whole his very finger-tips!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:5: None the less, man chooses to deny what lies ahead of him,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:6: asking [derisively], "When is that Resurrection Day to be?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:7: But [on that Day,] when the eyesight is by fear confounded,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:9: and the sun and the moon are brought together –
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:10: on that Day will man exclaim, "Whither to flee?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:11: But nay: no refuge [for thee, O man]!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:12: With thy Sustainer, on that Day, the journey’s end will be!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:13: Man will be apprised, on that Day, of what he has done and what he has left undone:
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:14: nay, but man shall against himself be an eye-witness,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:15: even though he may veil himself in excuses.
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:16: MOVE NOT thy tongue in haste, [repeating the words of the revelation:]
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:17: for, behold, it is for Us to gather it [in thy heart,] and to cause it to be read [as it ought to be read].
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:18: Thus, when We recite it, follow thou its wording [with all thy mind]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:19: and then, behold, it will be for Us to make its meaning clear.
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:20: NAY, but [most of] you love this fleeting life,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:21: and give no thought to the life to come [and to Judgment Day]!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:22: Some faces will on that Day be bright with happiness,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:24: and some faces will on that Day be overcast with despair,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:25: knowing that a crushing calamity is about to befall them.
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:26: NAY, but when [the last breath] comes up to the throat [of a dying man],
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:27: and people ask, "Is there any wizard [that could save him]?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:28: the while he [himself] knows that this is the parting,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:29: and is enwrapped in the pangs of death
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:30: at that time towards thy Sustainer does he feel impelled to turn!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:31: [Useless, though, will be his repentance:] for [as long as he was alive] he did not accept the truth, nor did he pray [for enlightenment],
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:32: but, on the contrary, he gave the lie to the truth and turned away [from it],
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:33: and then went arrogantly back to what he had come from.
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:34: [And yet, O man, thine end comes hourly] nearer unto thee, and nearer
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:35: and ever nearer unto thee, and nearer!
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:36: DOES MAN, then, think that he is to be left to himself, to go about at will?
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:37: Was he not once a [mere] drop of sperm that had been spilt,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:38: and thereafter became a germ-cell – whereupon He created and formed [it] in accordance with what [it] was meant to be,
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:39: and fashioned out of it the two sexes, the male and the female?
Muhammad Asad.verse 75:40: Is not He, then, able to bring the dead back to life?

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:1: I swear by the Day of Resurrection,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:2: and I swear by the self-reproaching conscience, (that Resurrection is a reality.)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:3: Does man think that We will never reassemble his bones?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:4: Why (can We) not (do so), while We are able to reset (even) his fingertips perfectly?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:5: But man wishes to go on violating Allah’s injunctions (even in future) ahead of him.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:6: He asks, “When will be this Day of Resurrection?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:7: So, when the eyes will be dazzled,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:8: and the moon will lose its light,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:9: and the sun and the moon will be joined together,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:10: on that day man will say, “Where to escape?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:11: Never! There will be no refuge at all.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:12: On that day, towards your Lord will be the destination (of everyone.)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:13: Man will be informed of what he sent ahead and what he left behind.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:14: Rather, man will be a witness against himself,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:15: even though he may offer his excuses.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:16: (O Prophet,) do not move your tongue (during revelation) for (reciting) it (the Qur’ān) to receive it in hurry.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:17: It is surely undertaken by Us to store it (in your heart), and to let it be recited (by you after revelation is completed).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:18: Therefore, when it is recited by Us (through the angel), follow its recitation (by concentration of your heart).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:19: Then, it is undertaken by Us to explain it.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:20: Never, (your denial of Resurrection is never based on any sound reason!) Instead, you love that which is immediate,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:22: Many faces, that day, will be glowing,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:24: and many faces, that day, will be gloomy,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:25: realizing that a back-breaking calamity is going to be afflicted on them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:26: Never, (you will never remain in this world forever!) When the soul (of a patient) reaches the clavicles,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:27: and it is said, “Who is an enchanter (that can save him?)”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:28: and he realizes that it is (the time of) departure (from the world,)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:29: and one shank is intertwined with the other shank,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:30: then on that day, it is to your Lord that one has to be driven.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:31: So (the denier of the Hereafter) neither believed, nor prayed,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:32: but rejected the truth and turned away (from it),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:33: then he went to his home, puffed up with pride.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:34: (It will be said to such a man,) Woe to you, then woe to you!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:35: Again, woe to you, then woe to you!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:36: Does man presume that he will be left unchecked?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:37: Was he not an ejaculated drop of semen?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:38: Then he became a clot of blood, then He created (him) and made (him) perfect,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:39: and made from him two kinds, male and female.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 75:40: Has He no power to give life to the dead?

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:1: Nay! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:2: And, nay, I swear by the (self-)reproaching soul.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:3: Does man suppose that We shall not assemble his bones?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:4: Yes, indeed! We are able to reshape [even] his fingers!
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:5: Nay, but man desires to deny what lies ahead of him.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:6: He asks, ‘When is the Day of Resurrection?’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:7: But when the eyes are dazzled
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:9: and the sun and the moon are brought together —
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:10: on that day man will say, ‘Where is the escape?’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:11: No indeed! There is no refuge.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:12: On that day the recourse will be to your Lord.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:13: On that day man will be informed of what he has sent ahead and left behind.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:14: Rather man has insight into his [own] soul,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:15: though he should offer his excuses.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:16: Do not move your tongue with it to hasten it.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:17: Assuredly it is for Us to bring it together and to recite it.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:18: So, when We recite it, follow its recitation.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:19: Then, it is for Us to explain it.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:20: No indeed! Rather you love the transitory
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:22: Some faces on that day will be radiant,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:24: And other faces on that day will be scowling,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:25: certain that a spine-crushing calamity will fall on them.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:26: No indeed! When it reaches up to the collar bones,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:27: and it is said: ‘Where is the enchanter?’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:28: and he suspects that it is the [time of] parting,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:29: and the shank is intertwined with the [other] shank;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:30: on that day to your Lord will be the driving [of the souls].
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:31: For he neither affirmed [the truth], nor prayed,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:32: but he denied and he turned away,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:33: then went off to his family swaggering.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:35: then [may woe be] nearer to you and nearer!
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:36: Does man suppose that he is to be left aimless?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:37: Was he not a drop of emitted semen?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:38: Then it became a clot; then He created and proportioned ,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:39: and made of it the two sexes, the male and the female.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 75:40: Is not such able to revive the dead?

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:1: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:2: And I swear by the blaming self, reproaching (itself for evil deeds).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:3: Does man think We shall not at all collect his bones (which will decompose into dust particles after his death)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:4: Yes, of course! We have also the power to restore and set right even his finger joints and finger tips.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:5: Yet man still wants to continue committing sins also (in the life to come).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:6: He asks (scornfully): ‘When is the Day of Resurrection?’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:7: But when the eyes will be dazzled,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:8: And the moon will be eclipsed,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:9: And the sun and the moon will be fused (i.e., darkened) together,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:10: On that Day man will cry out: ‘Where to flee away?’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:11: No indeed! There is no place of refuge.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:12: The place of refuge and repose that Day will be with your Lord alone.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:13: That Day man will be informed of those (deeds) which he sent forward and those (repercussions) which he left behind (after his death).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:14: In truth, man will (himself) be aware of (the affairs of) his self,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:15: Even though he will offer all his excuses.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:16: (O Beloved!) Do not move your tongue in a hurry (to learn the Qur’an by heart when it is revealed to you).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:17: Assuredly, upon Us rests its collection and preservation (in your breast) and its recitation (by your tongue).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:18: So when We complete its recitation (by the tongue of Jibril [Gabriel]), then follow that recitation.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:19: Then surely upon Us is the clear exposition (of its implications).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:20: The truth is, (O disbelievers,) that you love (the world) which you can readily gain.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:21: And you have left aside the Hereafter.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:22: Many faces will be fresh and in full bloom that Day,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:23: Beholding (the enchanting radiance and beauty of) their Lord (unveiled).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:24: And many faces will be deformed (depressed and dark) that Day,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:25: Thinking that they will be subjected to such a harsh treatment that will break their backbones.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:26: No indeed! When the soul reaches the throat,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:27: And it is said: ‘Who can (now) treat him with magic (to cure him)?’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:28: And (the departing soul) comes to realize that (now) is the hour of parting (with all).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:29: And one leg clings to the other;
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:30: Towards your Lord is the departure that Day.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:31: So (how ill-fated is he that) he neither affirmed (what the Messenger said) nor offered Prayer.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:32: Rather he kept belying and turning away.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:33: Then he went off towards his family in arrogance.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:34: Woe to you (when dying), then woe to you (in the grave),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:35: Then again woe to you (on the Last Day), then woe to you (in Hell)!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:36: Does man think that he will be left for nothing (without any reckoning)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:37: Was he not (in his beginning) a sperm drop ejaculated (into the woman’s womb)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:38: Then it developed into a hanging mass (clinging to the womb like a nest). Then He created (in it the preliminary form of all the limbs of the body). Then He set (them) right.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:39: Then He made from the same sperm drop two genders: male and female.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 75:40: Then has He not the power to give life to the dead again?

null.verse 75:2: kutsun todistajaksi omantunnon soimaavan äänen!
null.verse 75:3: »Luuleeko ihminen, että Me emme kerran voi koota hänen luitaan?
null.verse 75:4: Kyllä, Me kykenemme uusimaan täydellisesti hänen sormensakin.»
null.verse 75:5: Ihminen tuudittaa itsensä epäuskoon tulevan elämän suhteen.
null.verse 75:6: Hän kysyy: »Milloin ylösnousemuksen päivä koittaa?»
null.verse 75:7: Mutta kun se päivä sumentaa hänen näkönsä
null.verse 75:9: kun aurinko ja kuu yhdessä sammuvat,
null.verse 75:10: sinä päivänä ihminen on sanova: »Missä on paikka, mihin voisin paeta?»
null.verse 75:12: Sinä päivänä on ainoa turvapaikka Jumalan luona.
null.verse 75:13: Sinä päivänä julistetaan ihmiselle, mitä hän on tehnyt ja mitä laiminlyönyt.
null.verse 75:14: Ihminen joutuu todistuskappaleeksi omaa itseään vastaan,
null.verse 75:15: vaikkapa hän miten latelisi puolustelujaan.
null.verse 75:16: Älä liikuta kieltäsi tyrkyttääksesi heille sitä (Koraania) ennen aikojaan.
null.verse 75:17: Totisesti Me huolehdimme sen kokoonpanosta ja julkilukemisesta.
null.verse 75:18: Seuraa siis sitä järjestystä, missä Me sen saatamme julki,
null.verse 75:19: Sillä Meistähän sen tulkintakin on lähtevä.
null.verse 75:20: Ei, te ihmiset rakastatte nykyistä elämäänne
null.verse 75:22: Sinä päivänä säteilevät muutamien kasvot
null.verse 75:24: ja sinä päivänä synkkenevät toisten ilmeet,
null.verse 75:25: kun he tietävät, että jotakin tuhoisaa heille tapahtuu.
null.verse 75:26: Ei, kun sydän nousee kurkkuun
null.verse 75:27: ja kysytään: »Kuka taikuri nyt pystyy (kaiken torjumaan)?»
null.verse 75:28: Ja ihminen uskoo, että hänen lähtönsä hetki on tullut
null.verse 75:29: ja toinen isku tyrmää hänet toisensa jälkeen,
null.verse 75:30: sinä päivänä käy hänen tiensä kohti Herraa.
null.verse 75:31: Sillä hän ei uskonut eikä rukoillut,
null.verse 75:32: vaan sanoi totuutta valheeksi ja käänsi sille selkänsä,
null.verse 75:33: käyden sitten korskeana omiensa luo.
null.verse 75:35: Ja vielä! Voi sinua, voi!
null.verse 75:36: Luuleeko ihminen, että hänen sallitaan kuljeksia ilman määränpäätä?
null.verse 75:37: Eikö hän (aikanaan) ollut pieni siemenestä kylvetty itu?
null.verse 75:38: Sitten tuli hänestä hyytynyttä verta; Jumalahan loi hänet ja teki hänet täydelliseksi
null.verse 75:39: sekä muodosti kaksi sukupuolta, miehen ja naisen.
null.verse 75:40: Eikö Hän kykene herättämään henkiin kuolleita?

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:1: Non !... Je jure par le Jour de la Résurrection !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:2: Non !... Je jure par l'âme blâmante !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:3: L'homme pense-t-il que Nous ne rassemblerons pas ses ossements ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:4: Que si ! Nous avons le pouvoir de restaurer ses phalanges.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:5: Et pourtant, il préfère nier l'évidence.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:6: Il demande : " Quand donc viendra le Jour de la Résurrection ? "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:9: que le soleil et la lune seront réunis.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:10: Ce Jour-là, l'homme dira : " Où fuir ? "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:11: Mais non ! Il n'y a pas de refuge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:12: Ce Jour-là, l'asile sera vers ton Seigneur ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:13: ce Jour-là, l'homme sera informé de tout ce qu'il aura accompli à l'avance ou en retard.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:16: N'agite pas ta langue en lisant le Coran pour en hâter la récitation,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:17: c'est à Nous qu'il appartient de le rassembler et de le lire.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:18: Lorsque Nous le lisons, suis-en la lecture ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:19: c'est à Nous qu'il appartient, ensuite, de l'expliciter.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:21: et vous négligez la vie dernière.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:22: Ce Jour-là, il y aura des visages lumineux
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:23: qui tourneront leurs regards vers leur Seigneur.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:24: Ce Jour-là, il y aura des visages abattus
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:25: qui penseront qu'un terrible sort les attend.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:26: Mais non ! Lorsque la vie remonte à la gorge,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:27: que l'on s'interroge : " Qui est le magicien ? ",
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:28: que l'on se dit : " Voici venue la séparation ! " ,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:29: que la jambe se crispe contre la jambe,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:30: ce Jour-là, chacun est poussé vers ton Seigneur.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:31: Il n'a pas reconnu la vérité, il n'a pas prié ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:32: bien au contraire, il a crié au mensonge et s'est détourné ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:33: puis il est parti vers les siens en marchant fièrement.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:34: L'Heure est proche de toi, et encore plus proche !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:35: Elle est proche de toi, et encore plus proche !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:36: L'homme pense-t-il qu'on le laissera libre ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:37: N'a-t-il pas été une goutte de sperme fluide ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:38: Ensuite elle est devenue un caillot de sang que Dieu a formé et façonné.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:39: De celui-ci, il a fait un couple : le mâle et la femelle.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 75:40: Celui qui a agi ainsi n'a-t-il pas le pouvoir de ressusciter les morts ? "

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:1: Non ! ... Je jure par le jour de la Résurrection !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:2: Mais non ! , Je jure par l’âme qui ne cesse de se blâmer. .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:3: L’homme, pense-t-il que Nous ne réunirons jamais ses os ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:4: Mais si ! Nous sommes Capable de remettre à leur place les extrémités de ses doigts. .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:5: L’homme voudrait plutôt continuer à vivre en libertin.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:6: Il interroge : «A quand, le Jour de la Résurrection ? »
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:9: et que le soleil et la lune serons réunis,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:12: Vers ton Seigneur sera, ce jour-là, le retour.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:13: L’homme sera informé ce jour-là de ce qu’il aura avancé et de ce qu’il aura remis à plus tard.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:14: Mais l’homme sera un témoin perspicace contre lui-même,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:15: quand même il présenterait ses excuses.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:16: Ne remue pas ta langue pour hâter sa récitation :
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:17: Son rassemblement (dans ton coeur et sa fixation dans ta mémoire) Nous incombent, ainsi que la façon de le réciter. .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:18: Quand donc Nous le récitons , suis sa récitation.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:19: A Nous, ensuite incombera son explication.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:20: Mais vous aimez plutôt [la vie] éphémère,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:22: Ce jour-là, il y aura des visages resplendissants
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:24: et il y aura ce jour-là, des visages assombris,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:25: qui s’attendent à subir une catastrophe.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:26: Mais non ! Quand [l’âme] en arrive aux clavicules
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:28: et qu’il [l’agonisant] est convaincu que c’est la séparation (la mort),
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:29: et que la jambe s’enlace à la jambe,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:30: c’est vers ton Seigneur, ce jour-là que tu seras conduit.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:31: Mais il n’a ni cru, ni fait la Salat;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:32: par contre, il a démenti et tourné le dos,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:33: puis il s’en est allé vers sa famille, marchant avec orgueil.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:35: Et encore malheur à toi, malheur !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:36: L’homme pense-t-il qu’on le laissera sans obligation à observer ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:37: N’était-il pas une goutte de sperme éjaculé ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:38: Et ensuite une adhérence Puis [Dieu] l’a créée et formée harmonieusement;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:39: puis en a fait alors les deux éléments de couple : le mâle et la femelle ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 75:40: Celui-là (Dieu) n’est-Il pas capable de faire revivre les morts ?

null.verse 75:1: Nein! Ich rufe zum Zeugen den Tag der Auferstehung.
null.verse 75:2: Nein! Ich rufe zum Zeugen die sich selbst anklagende Seele.
null.verse 75:3: Wähnt der Mensch, daß Wir seine Gebeine nicht sammeln werden?
null.verse 75:4: Fürwahr, Wir sind imstande, (sogar) seine Fingerspitzen zusammenzufügen.
null.verse 75:5: Doch der Mensch wünscht, Sündhaftigkeit vor sich vorauszuschicken.
null.verse 75:6: Er fragt: «Wann wird der Tag der Auferstehung sein?»
null.verse 75:9: Und die Sonne und der Mond vereinigt werden.
null.verse 75:10: An jenem Tage wird der Mensch sprechen: «Wohin nun fliehen?»
null.verse 75:12: (Nur) zu deinem Herrn wird an jenem Tage die Rückkehr sein.
null.verse 75:13: Verkündet wird dem Menschen an jenem Tage, was er vorausgesandt und was er zurückgelassen hat.
null.verse 75:14: Nein, der Mensch ist Zeuge wider sich selber,
null.verse 75:15: Auch wenn er Entschuldigungen vorbringt.
null.verse 75:16: Rühre nicht deine Zunge mit dieser (Offenbarung), sie zu beschleunigen.
null.verse 75:17: Uns obliegt ihre Sammlung und ihre Lesung.
null.verse 75:18: Drum, wenn Wir sie lesen, folge ihrer Lesung;
null.verse 75:19: Dann obliegt Uns ihre Erläuterung.
null.verse 75:20: Nein, ihr aber, ihr liebt das Gegenwärtige
null.verse 75:22: Manche Gesichter werden an jenem Tage leuchtend sein,
null.verse 75:24: Und manche Gesichter werden an jenem Tage gramvoll sein,
null.verse 75:25: Denn sie ahnen, daß ein schreckliches Unglück ihnen demnächst widerfahren soll.
null.verse 75:26: Ja! wenn (die Seele eines Sterbenden) zur Kehle emporsteigt
null.verse 75:27: Und gesprochen wird: «Wer ist der Zauberer (der ihn rette)?»;
null.verse 75:28: Und er weiß, daß es (die Stunde des) Scheidens ist
null.verse 75:29: Und Todespein auf Todespein gehäuft wird;
null.verse 75:30: Zu deinem Herrn wird an jenem Tage das Treiben sein.
null.verse 75:31: Denn er spendete nicht und betete nicht,
null.verse 75:32: Sondern er leugnete und wandte sich ab;
null.verse 75:33: Dann ging er zu seiner Sippe mit stolzem Gang.
null.verse 75:35: Und abermals wehe dir! und nochmals wehe!»
null.verse 75:36: Wähnt der Mensch etwa, er solle ganz ungebunden bleiben?
null.verse 75:37: War er nicht ein Tropfen fließenden Samens, der verspritzt ward?
null.verse 75:38: Dann wurde er ein Blutklumpen, dann bildete und vervollkommnete Er (ihn).
null.verse 75:39: So schuf Er aus ihm ein Paar, den Mann und das Weib.
null.verse 75:40: Und da sollte Er nicht imstande sein, die Toten ins Leben zu rufen?
